   16: -module(metrics_api_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: 
   21: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %% Suite configuration
   23: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   24: all() ->
   25:     [{group, metrics},
   26:      {group, stories},
   27:      {group, global}
   28:     ].
   29: 
   30: groups() ->
   31:     [{metrics, [], [message_flow]},
   32:      {stories, [], [one_client_just_logs_in,
   33:                     two_clients_just_log_in,
   34:                     one_message_sent,
   35:                     one_direct_presence_sent,
   36:                     one_iq_sent,
   37:                     one_message_error,
   38:                     one_iq_error,
   39:                     one_presence_error
   40:                    ]},
   41:      {global, [], [session_counters,
   42:                    node_uptime]}
   43:     ].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     Config1 = dynamic_modules:stop_running(mod_offline, Config),
   47:     Config2 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config1),
   48:     katt_helper:init_per_suite(Config2).
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     katt_helper:end_per_suite(Config),
   52:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config),
   53:     dynamic_modules:start_running(Config).
   54: 
   55: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     escalus:create_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   57: 
   58: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   59:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   60: 
   61: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   62:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   63: 
   64: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   65:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   66: 
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% metrics_api tests
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: message_flow(Config) ->
   72:     katt_helper:run(metrics, Config).
   73: 
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: %% metric update tests
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: 
   78: one_client_just_logs_in(Config) ->
   79:     instrumented_story
   80:         (Config, [{alice, 1}],
   81:          fun(_Alice) -> end_of_story end,
   82:          %% A list of metrics and their expected relative increase
   83:          [{xmppIqSent, 0},
   84:           {xmppIqReceived, 0},
   85:           {xmppMessageSent, 0},
   86:           {xmppMessageReceived, 0},
   87:           {xmppPresenceSent, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
   88:           {xmppPresenceReceived, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
   89:           {xmppStanzaSent, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
   90:           {xmppStanzaReceived, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
   91:           {sessionSuccessfulLogins, 0 + user_alpha(1)},
   92:           {sessionLogouts, 0 + user_alpha(1)}
   93:          ]).
   94: 
   95: two_clients_just_log_in(Config) ->
   96:     instrumented_story
   97:         (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
   98:          fun(_Alice, _Bob) -> end_of_story end,
   99:          [{xmppMessageSent, 0},
  100:           {xmppMessageReceived, 0},
  101:           {xmppStanzaSent, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  102:           {xmppStanzaReceived, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  103:           {xmppPresenceSent, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  104:           {xmppPresenceReceived, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  105:           {sessionSuccessfulLogins, 0 + user_alpha(2)},
  106:           {sessionLogouts, 0 + user_alpha(2)}
  107:          ]).
  108: 
  109: one_message_sent(Config) ->
  110:     instrumented_story
  111:       (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  112:        fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  113:                Chat = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi!">>),
  114:                escalus_client:send(Alice, Chat),
  115:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  116:        end,
  117:        [{xmppMessageSent,     1},
  118:         {xmppMessageReceived, 1}]).
  119: 
  120: one_direct_presence_sent(Config) ->
  121:     instrumented_story
  122:       (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  123:        fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  124:                Presence = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"available">>),
  125:                escalus:send(Alice, Presence),
  126:                escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  127:         end,
  128:        [{xmppPresenceSent, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  129:         {xmppPresenceReceived, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  130:         {xmppStanzaSent, 1 + user_alpha(2)},
  131:         {xmppStanzaReceived, 1 + user_alpha(2)}]).
  132: 
  133: one_iq_sent(Config) ->
  134:     instrumented_story
  135:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  136:        fun(Alice) ->
  137:                RosterIq = escalus_stanza:roster_get(),
  138:                escalus_client:send(Alice, RosterIq),
  139:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  140:         end,
  141:        [{xmppIqSent, 1},
  142:         {xmppIqReceived, 1},
  143:         {modRosterGets, 1},
  144:         {xmppStanzaSent, 1 + user_alpha(1)},
  145:         {xmppStanzaReceived, 1 + user_alpha(1)}]).
  146: 
  147: one_message_error(Config) ->
  148:     instrumented_story
  149:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  150:        fun(Alice) ->
  151:                Chat = escalus_stanza:chat_to
  152:                         (<<"nobody@localhost">>, <<"Hi!">>),
  153:                escalus_client:send(Alice, Chat),
  154:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  155:         end,
  156:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  157:         {xmppErrorIq, 0},
  158:         {xmppErrorMessage, 1},
  159:         {xmppErrorPresence, 0}]).
  160: 
  161: one_iq_error(Config) ->
  162:     instrumented_story
  163:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  164:        fun(Alice) ->
  165:                BadIQ = escalus_stanza:iq_set(<<"BadNS">>, []),
  166:                escalus_client:send(Alice, BadIQ),
  167:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  168:         end,
  169:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  170:         {xmppErrorIq, 1},
  171:         {xmppErrorMessage, 0},
  172:         {xmppErrorPresence, 0}]).
  173: 
  174: one_presence_error(Config) ->
  175:     instrumented_story
  176:       (Config, [{alice, 1}],
  177:        fun(Alice) ->
  178:                BadPres = escalus_stanza:presence_direct
  179:                            (<<"localhost/no-such-resource">>, <<"subscribed">>, []),
  180:                escalus_client:send(Alice, BadPres),
  181:                escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  182:         end,
  183:        [{xmppErrorTotal, 1},
  184:         {xmppErrorIq, 0},
  185:         {xmppErrorMessage, 0},
  186:         {xmppErrorPresence, 1}]).
  187: 
  188: session_counters(Config) ->
  189:     escalus:story
  190:       (Config,
  191:        [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  192:        fun(_Alice1, _Alice2, _Bob) ->
  193:                3 = fetch_global_counter_value(totalSessionCount, Config),
  194:                2 = fetch_global_counter_value(uniqueSessionCount, Config),
  195:                3 = fetch_global_counter_value(nodeSessionCount, Config)
  196:        end).
  197: 
  198: node_uptime(Config) ->
  199:       X = fetch_global_counter_value(nodeUpTime, Config),
  200:       timer:sleep(timer:seconds(1)),
  201:       Y = fetch_global_counter_value(nodeUpTime, Config),
  202:       true = Y > X.
  203: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  204: %% Helpers
  205: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  206: 
  207: user_alpha(NumberOfUsers) ->
  208:     %% This represents the overhead of logging in N users via escalus:story/3
  209:     %% For each user,
  210:     %%     xmppStanza(sent|received)
  211:     %%     and
  212:     %%     xmppPresence(sent|recieved)
  213:     %% will be bumped by +1 at login.
  214:     NumberOfUsers.
  215: 
  216: instrumented_story(Config, UsersSpecs, StoryFun, CounterSpecs) ->
  217:     Befores = fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs),
  218:     StoryResult = escalus:story(Config, UsersSpecs, StoryFun),
  219:     Afters =  fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs),
  220:     [ assert_counter_inc(Name, N, find(Name, Befores), find(Name, Afters))
  221:       || {Name, N} <- CounterSpecs ],
  222:     StoryResult.
  223: 
  224: fetch_all(Config, CounterSpecs) ->
  225:     [ {Counter, fetch_counter_value(Counter, Config)}
  226:       || {Counter, _} <- CounterSpecs ].
  227: 
  228: find(CounterName, CounterList) ->
  229:     case lists:keyfind(CounterName, 1, CounterList) of
  230:         false -> error(counter_defined_incorrectly);
  231:         {CounterName, Val} -> Val end.
  232: 
  233: fetch_counter_value(Counter, Config) ->
  234:     Params = [{host, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)},
  235:               {metric, atom_to_list(Counter)}],
  236:     {_, _, _, Vars, _} = katt_helper:run(metric, Config, Params),
  237:     HostValue = proplists:get_value("value_host", Vars),
  238:     HostValueList = proplists:get_value("value_host_list", Vars),
  239:     TotalValue = proplists:get_value("value_total", Vars),
  240:     TotalValueList = proplists:get_value("value_total_list", Vars),
  241:     [HostValue, HostValueList, TotalValue, TotalValueList].
  242: 
  243: fetch_global_counter_value(Counter, Config) ->
  244:     Params = [{metric, atom_to_list(Counter)}],
  245: 
  246:     {_, _, _, Vars, _} = katt_helper:run(global, Config, Params),
  247: 
  248:     Value = proplists:get_value("value", Vars),
  249:     Value = proplists:get_value("value_list", Vars).
  250: 
  251: assert_counter_inc(Name, Inc, Counters1, Counters2) ->
  252:     ExpectedCounters = [Counter+Inc || Counter <- Counters1],
  253:     case ExpectedCounters == Counters2 of
  254:         false ->
  255:             ct:comment("Expected ~w, got: ~w", [ExpectedCounters, Counters2]),
  256:             error({unexpected_values, Name, get_diffs(ExpectedCounters, Counters2)});
  257:         true -> ok
  258:     end.
  259: 
  260: get_diffs(L1,L2) ->
  261:     lists:zip(L1, L2).
